review_text: The product arrived quickly and the packaging was great. I'm very satisfied!
Terrible customer service. I waited 40 minutes on the phone and got no help.
Average quality. Not bad, but definitely not worth the price.
Absolutely love it! Works better than expected and the support team was super helpful.
The delivery was late again. This is the third time! Very disappointed.
Świetny produkt, działa perfekcyjnie! Polecam wszystkim!
Nie polecam. Produkt przyszedł uszkodzony i musiałem go zwrócić.
Good value for money. Exactly what I was looking for!
The app keeps crashing. Please fix it ASAP.
Fantastic customer service! They responded within minutes and solved my problem.
